titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow exclusion of gain or loss on like-kind exchanges of virtual currency.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow exclusion of gain or loss on like-kind exchanges of virtual currency.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Virtual Value Tax Fix Act of 2019
This bill allows an exclusion of gain or loss, for income tax purposes, on like-kind exchanges of virtual currency completed prior to 2025.
